question: The ‘Zulus’ tribe, which was making news recently, belong to which country?
explanation:
The Zulu people are the largest ethnic group in South Africa with an estimated 10–12 million people.
Goodwill Zwelithini, the famous king of the Zulus, has died at the age of 72. Though he did not hold any official power in modern South Africa, the king had a great influence among millions of Zulus through his spiritual role.
